title: Dr. Kildare's Strange Case (1940; smallest download)

sources.title: Kildares Strange Case
sources.description: [Doctor Kildare's Strange Case] The story was co-authored by Max Brand, the creator of Dr. Kildare. Actors: Lew Ayres; Lionel Barrymore; Laraine Day Runtime: 1:14:40 Here's another Kildare movie: The Secret of Dr. Kildare This is in the public domain because the copyright was not renewed. (In fact, it is included in Mill Creek's Crime Classics 50-movie pack.) Of the Kildare movies starring Lew Ayres, these didn't have copyright renewals: THE SECRET OF DR. KILDARE (1939) DR. KILDARE'S STRANGE CASE (1940) Here are the copyright renewals for the others: YOUNG DR. KILDARE, a photoplay in eight reels by Loew's. (C) 12Oct38; L8362. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 12Oct65; R369914. CALLING DR. KILDARE, a photoplay in nine reels by Loew's. (C) 24Apr39; L8813. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 25Apr66; R384977. DR. KILDARE GOES HOME, a photoplay in eight reels by Loew's. (C) 5Sep40; L9894. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 2Oct67; R418348. DR. KILDARE'S CRISIS, a photoplay in eight reels by Loew's. (C) 26Nov40; L10098. Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 29Nov67; R422923. THE PEOPLE VS. DR. KILDARE, a photo- play in eight reels by Loew's. (C) 29Apr41; L10443. Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 2May68; R434833. DR. KILDARE'S WEDDING DAY, a photoplay in eight reels by Loew's. (C) 12Aug41; L10668. Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 14Aug68; R441560. DR. KILDARE'S VICTORY, a photoplay in 9 reels by Loew's. From a story by Joseph Harrington; based upon the characters created by Max Brand. (C) 26Nov41; L10882. Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer, Inc. (PWH); 27Nov68; R449745.
